name: Ragdoll Cliff Diving
description:
Welcome to Ragdoll Cliff Diving!

Execute perfect dives from a range of challenging cliffs!  Dodge obstacles, change pose, and rotate in the air to meet the judge's targets.  Can you three-star all of the levels?

This game was submitted for a Birmingham City University graded assignment. The objective was to create a physics-based game using the Unity game engine.

Thank you for playing!
